title: Smart Inventory Management
subtitle: Real-time tracking of equipment, materials, and consumables across all field locations.
teaser: Track every piece of equipment and material in real-time with RFID integration and predictive restocking.
body:
Revolutionizing Field Inventory Control

OverSiteAI's Smart Inventory Management system brings unprecedented visibility and control to your field operations inventory. Track every piece of equipment, every barrel of fluid, and every consumable item in real-time.

Key Features

  • RFID & Barcode Integration - Automatic tracking of tagged equipment and materials
  • Predictive Restocking - AI-powered forecasting prevents stockouts before they happen
  • Multi-Site Visibility - View inventory levels across all locations from a single dashboard
  • Automated Reordering - Set thresholds and let the system handle procurement

Benefits

Reduce carrying costs by up to 30% while ensuring critical supplies are always available. Our clients report significant reductions in emergency orders and expedited shipping costs.

Integration Capabilities

Seamlessly connects with existing ERP systems, procurement platforms, and accounting software for a unified operational view.
